review: best gadget ive purchased in a long time
author: willow

review: Love it. Use it in my apt were I don't have a box. Also when I go away I take it to watch my cable programs
author: steven cohen

review: Love Chromecast! now I can connect my phone to my tv so that I am able to play games or read news stories on a larger screen!
author: CRose

review: Ordered on Aug 19th, delivered on Aug 24th neatly and safely packaged in bubble envelope. Haven't had time to set it up yet, but everything looks good so far; pretty satisfied at this juncture.
author: carlos c delara

review: Fantastic device.  But be forewarned if you are purchasing this as I did, as a results of the HGTV advertisements to use Chromecast and the HGTV Watch phone/tablet app to watch your favorite HGTV shows on a large TV: you cannot cast the live HGTV programming to your large TV.  You can only cast the previously-aired show library, which is fairly good.  Also, of course, you need to be paying a cable provider for HGTV and login using those credentials.
author: John
